<details>
<summary>Click to expand or collapse this section. </summary>

**Introduction**

* This is a test of the collapsible section functionality.
* Ensure that expanding and collapsing works smoothly.

**Detailed Information**

* **Subheading 1:** Hereâ€™s some additional information to test the layout.
* **Subheading 2:** More text to see how it handles longer content.

**Lists and Items**

* Item 1
* Item 2
* Item 3

**Additional Elements**

* **Bold Text:** This should be bold.
* *Italic Text:* This should be italic.
* Example Link 

**Images**

![test](/cms/cms-assets/media/defaultlogo.png "This is a Zelis logo")

**Code Snippet**

```javascript
function test() {
    console.log('Testing collapsible section.');
}
```

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tips for collapsed sections</summary>

### You can add a header

You can add text within a collapsed section. 

You can add an image or a code block, too.

```ruby
puts "Hello World
```

</details>
title: Test Collapsible Section
